header.title: Say goodbye to kitchen dilemmas with Eat'Easy
header.subtitle: Unlock the power of your pantry! We help you to generate personalized recipes based on the ingredients you already have. Save time, reduce waste, and enjoy healthy, delicious meals tailored to your preferences.

features.sectionSubtitle: Eat'Easy is your smart cooking assistant, packed with AI features that make meal planning effortless and recipe discovery exciting. Transform your kitchen experience with intelligent recipe suggestions!

addIngredients.title: Smart Ingredient Management
addIngredients.description: Easily add and track ingredients from your kitchen inventory. Our AI recognizes your pantry items for accurate recipe matching.

generateRecipes.title: AI Recipe Generator
generateRecipes.description: Get personalized recipe suggestions powered by artificial intelligence, perfectly matched to your available ingredients and dietary preferences.

mealPrepTracker.title: Organize Your Meal Prep and Track Calories
mealPrepTracker.description: Effortlessly plan your meals and track the calories you consume to stay on top of your health goals.

challengeFriends.title: Challenge Friends
challengeFriends.description: Compete with your friends to complete challenges and earn badges as you progress.

scanReceipts.title: Scan Shopping Receipts
scanReceipts.description: Upload your shopping receipts to automatically add items to your inventory.

voiceToText.title: Voice to Text
voiceToText.description: Use voice commands to add ingredients or find recipes with ease.
